name: FireRescue
short_description:
FireRescue is an educational game which can improve your arithmetic capability. When the alarm bells rings, your little firefighter are going to rescue people in the building. You can user the water gun to put out the fire, find the different crosses to improve your power. 

You can select the ladder or the jump spring based in different levels. When the user get the right floor and rescue the people successfully, you will get to the next level. The difficulty will increase with the level.

This game is Kid tested and super fun. It has charming music and delightfully bright graphics. Little kids can chose the easy level to practice their addition and subtraction arithmetic skills and Bigger kids can chose the difficult level to practice four arithmetic operation. I'm sure your kids will become much smarter.

This game runs best on later generation phones. If you have trouble getting to work on your device, please let us know via wangshilianghit@gmail.com.
summary: FireResuce can improve your arithmetic capability
